name: Turkey Defense
description:
Control an army of turkeys to defend your precious coops from an onslaught of ferret hordes!

Turkey Defense is a strategy tower defense game for PC.

You will strategically place your defenses on a map to prevent ferrets from invading your turkey coops.    

This game was created for AIE's  End of Year Game Jam. 

Game & Sound Designers:

  • Trent Wood
  • Cooper Hall

Artists : 

  • Caleb Shaw 
  • Jaycee Isenhart
  • Kate Kruse

Programmer(s):

  • Forrest McCarthy 

Music: 

  • Jordan Dobson

Recommended System:

  • CPU: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-3820 CPU @ 3.60GHz 
  • RAM: 8GB
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 7, 64-bit Windows 8 (8.1) or 64-bit Windows 10
  • GPU: Nvidia GeForce GTX 770 or AMD equivalent 

Input Devices:

  • Mouse
  • Keyboard
